mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO bvision_live_view (player_id, viewer_id, modify_time) VALUES (#{playerId}, #{viewerId}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE IGNORE bvision_live_view SET modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM bvision_live_view WHERE player_id = #{playerId} AND viewer_id > 0
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT viewer_id) FROM bvision_live_view WHERE player_id = #{playerId} AND viewer_id > 0

SELECT viewer_id userId, auth_register_user.username username, COUNT(viewer_id) count, SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, bvision_live_view.create_time, bvision_live_view.modify_time)) seconds FROM bvision_live_view, auth_register_user WHERE viewer_id = auth_register_user.id AND player_id = #{playerId} AND viewer_id > 0 GROUP BY viewer_id, username ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT date (bvision_live_view.create_time) day, COUNT(1) count FROM bvision_live_view WHERE player_id = #{playerId} GROUP BY day
SELECT HOUR(bvision_live_view.create_time) hour, COUNT(1) count FROM bvision_live_view WHERE player_id = #{playerId} GROUP BY hour
